description:
*** THIS IS A TRIAL VERSION FOR EVALUATION PURPOSES. ***

Peg Puzzle: Shapes is a digital take on the classic children’s wooden peg puzzle toys. A fun and interactive way of learning, the game helps to develop fine motor skills, hand eye coordination, logical thinking skills and can also be used as a tool to help develop vocabulary through object recognition.

The object of the game is simple, match the correct shape to the correct space. Each time a right answer is achieved the player is rewarded by a visual and audio response and when all six spaces have been correctly filled the player receives a round of applause. 

This helps to build a sense of achievement which the child will wish to repeat again and again. The app is designed specifically for young children and has been tested by a range of 2 – 4 year olds. 

Each time a game is loaded six random shapes are selected and laid out on the board; each shape has six possible answers. This gives thousands of possible combinations giving hours of fun.

This is a trial version and includes all the items from the fruit peg puzzle.

Fruit shapes include:

Apricot, banana, grapes, green apple, lemon, lime, mango, melon, orange, peach, pear, plum, pomegranate, raspberry, red apple, red cherries, strawberry, yellow cherries

The full version includes:

Transport: Aeroplanes, boats, cars, helicopter, trucks, train and more

Music: Accordion, drum, guitars, keyboard, microphone, piano, trumpet, violin and more

Produce: Asparagus, beetroot, carrot, chillis, corn, mushroom, onion, pepper, pumpkin, tomato and more

Out at sea: Anchor, crab, diver, dolphin, lobster, octopus, prawns, seahorse, shells, squid, starfish and more

Garden: Beetle, bee, caterpillar, dragonfly, flowers, grasshopper, ladybird, spider, tools and more

Building Site: A range of construction vehicles & tools

Weather: Sun, rain, wind, snow, lightning, rainbow & more

Random: Shapes selected from any of the eight available categories
